snippet.title: Seven Days | Official Trailer | OUT NOW on Steam!
snippet.description:
#3d #unity #trailer #indiegame #explorationgames #new #steamgame 

Solve the mystery or enjoy your holiday.
My indie game, Seven Days is OUT NOW on Steam.

Purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2144320/Seven_Days

Watch the devlogs: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0tqYGHS5nyI&list=PLwofOHPt4ZRNa3_MxxG-j5LldJuUjtfaU&index=1
==========
GAME DESCRIPTION -
Seven Days is a single-player first-person exploration game. Play as a camper who has come to Camp Summershade for a peaceful retreat. But things take a turn when you start finding strange things around you at Summershade.
==========
SUBSCRIBE to Manas Joshi: https://www.youtube.com/c/ManasJoshi

Follow me @
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/monteboombox

Check out my Website: https://monteboombox.github.io/manas-joshi

Check out my games on Itch.io: https://monteboombox.itch.io

Play my game Moon Ground: https://monteboombox.itch.io/moon-ground
Play my game Healthy Warrior: https://monteboombox.itch.io/healthy-warrior
Play my game Hexagone Mad: https://monteboombox.itch.io/hexagone-mad
Play my game Terminal Hacker: https://monteboombox.itch.io/terminal-hacker
Get FREE 2D Survival Game Assets: https://monteboombox.itch.io/survival-2d-video-game-weapon-assets

About Me:
Hi there! I am Manas Joshi aka MonteBoomBox. I am a Game & Web Developer. I love to create video games which people would want to play!
